'''Francis de Wolff''' (1913 - 1984) was a British actor. He played in many Hammer Horror films, including ''[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0051542/ Corridors of Blood]'', in which he played half of a comic duo (the other half was [[Christopher Lee]]). De Wolff was, like Lee, often cast as an antagonist, and he voiced [[Smaug]] in the [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|1968 radio series]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
